public class DelimitedRecordDefinition
extends FlatRecordDefinition

A FixedLengthRecordDefinition is used to validate delimited records.

validateRecord

protected void validateRecord(Record r)
Description copied from class: RecordDefinition
Performs record level validations. If a validation error occurs, a record error should be added to the record.
